title: It Was Him: The Many Murders of Ed Edwards
resume: What would you do if you found out your grandfather was one of the most heinous serial killers in American history? Could Ed Edwards be responsible for the murders of Laci Peterson, Black Dahlia, JonBenét Ramsey, Jimmy Hoffa, Teresa Halbach, and the Zodiac Killings? Wayne Wolfe, along with veteran detective John Cameron, set out to find answers and bring closure to Wolfe's family.
